As children grow, teaching must be tailored to different age groups, with different methods and content. Of course, both verbal instruction and example are necessary. Third, parenting has a clear purpose: to lead them in the right way. Helping children find their purpose in life and the purpose for which God created them is central to parenting. In this way, parents can be at ease, knowing that even in old age, they will walk in the right path.

title: Don't Be Foolish
scriptureVerse: Therefore do not be foolish, but understand what the Lord's will is.
prelude: Time really waits for no one. The older you get, the more your memory and spirit decline, and the more opportunities you have to make mistakes. Some mistakes are harmless, but some, if you're not careful, can lead to death!
laugh:
A traffic policeman pulled over to the side of the road, waiting to arrest a speeder. He saw a car driving slowly at 22 miles per hour. Thinking that this was just as dangerous as speeding, the officer sounded the siren and ordered the car to pull over.

 The officer went over and saw five elderly women inside—two in the front and three in the back—pale-faced with wide-open eyes.'

 The elderly woman driving was clearly confused and said, 'Officer, I was driving at the correct speed. I don't understand what the problem is?' The officer, suppressing a laugh, explained to her, '22 isn't a speedometer sign; it's Highway 22.' A little embarrassed, the woman gave a wry smile and thanked the officer for pointing out her mistake. 'Before you leave,' the officer said, 'I have to ask you, are the other passengers in the car alright? These women seem extremely shocked!' 'Oh!' the old woman replied, 'They'll be fine, because we just turned off Highway 127!'
videoName: 升等的秘訣 | 曾興才牧師 | 20190224 | 生命河 ROLCCmedia
talk: It's fortunate that misreading a road sign didn't result in a fatality. But some people regret it for a lifetime because of a moment of confusion. Therefore, the Apostle Paul exhorts us not to be foolish. Why do people become foolish? Ignorance, carelessness, or old age and memory decline. Whatever the reason, we don't want to be foolish; we want to be wise. Wise people know when to do what and when not to do what; this is wisdom. Wisdom can be accumulated through life experience or comes from the Creator, Jehovah. Therefore, Paul says that a person who understands the Lord's will is not foolish. To understand the Lord's will, one must take the time to know Him, who is the Lord Jesus whom Paul preached and served. I hope you will soon come to know the Lord Jesus.

title: Walking with Wise People
scriptureVerse: Walk with the wise and become wise, for a companion of fools suffers harm.
prelude: When I was in seminary, a professor reminded us, 'If you want to become a certain kind of person, spend more time with that kind of people.' People influence each other.
laugh:
A famous professor often lectured at various universities. One day, on his way to a lecture, the driver said to him: 'Professor, I've attended your lecture more than fifty times, I know it by heart, I dare say I could teach this lecture too!' 

 'Oh, really? Great! Then let's switch roles later!' the professor replied. 

 Upon arriving at the university, the driver indeed went to lecture and finished the lecture without missing a single word.' But just as he was about to leave, a student suddenly asked a question. The driver couldn't answer it immediately, but he calmly said: 'Student, your question is too simple. To show you just how simple it is, I've decided to have my driver answer it!'
videoName: 你要先求神的國 | 曾興才牧師 | 20190106 | 生命河 ROLCCmedia
talk: There is a Chinese saying: 'One who stays near vermilion gets stained red, and one who stays near ink gets stained black.' Similarly, King Solomon, the wisest man in the Bible, directly tells us that those who walk with wise people will gain wisdom, but those who associate with fools will suffer loss. Therefore, we must think carefully before choosing friends or jobs. In your group of friends, who is the wise one? Spend more time with them. If you encounter a foolish person, be their wise one, and let them gradually become wiser through your company.

title: Don't Provoke Your Children to Anger
scriptureVerse: Fathers, do not exasperate your children; instead, bring them up in the training and instruction of the Lord.
prelude: Raising children is the duty of every parent, therefore, parents often rack their brains hoping their children will excel. However, sometimes what we do and the results we want to see are completely beyond our expectations.

He went back to his room, closed the door, and diligently did his homework for two hours. After having dinner, he went back upstairs and continued doing his homework until bedtime. This routine continued day after day until his first report card was released. Xiao Ming tossed the envelope on his desk and went back to his room to do his homework. His parents opened the report card and were astonished to find that he had gotten an A in math. Overjoyed, they rushed to Xiao Ming's room, thrilled by his progress and eager to know why. His father asked, 'Was it those nuns?' 'No!' Xiao Ming replied. Mom asked, 'Is it the textbook, the teacher, or the course schedule?' 'No!' Dad asked, 'Is it the pre-class prayer?' 'No, no!' Xiaoming replied, 'It's like this, on the first day of school, I saw someone in the classroom who was naked and nailed to the plus signs of addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. videoName: 經歷感恩的能力 | 曾興才牧師 | 20181118 | 生命河 ROLCCmedia
talk: Raising children requires wisdom and skill. Some parents raise their children based on their past experiences, while others help their children with what they've learned from books. Regardless of the methods used to raise children, the Apostle Paul especially exhorts fathers not to provoke their children, meaning not to let them lose their spirit through authoritarian discipline. Instead, fathers should mold their children's minds from a young age, according to the teachings of Jesus in the Bible, and assist them in growing strong according to their age, so that they can live out God's destiny for them. Therefore, relying solely on our own experience or books in the market is not enough; we must humbly come before the Lord, familiarize ourselves with the words of the Bible, and the Lord will surely give us wisdom to raise our children.

title: Don't Ask Too Much
scriptureVerse: When you ask, you do not receive, because you ask with wrong motives, that you may spend what you get on your pleasures.
prelude: Many people have a fantasy or a wish they dare not tell others, and when the opportunity to fulfill it arises, how can they miss it!
laugh:
Lao Gao, in his early sixties, and his wife were celebrating their thirty-fifth wedding anniversary in a quiet, romantic little restaurant. Suddenly, a beautiful little angel appeared at their table. 

 'To reward you two as a model couple, for being so loving over the years, I grant each of you a wish.' 

 The wife, who had always wanted to travel the world with her husband, replied: 

 'Oh, I want to travel the world with my dear husband.' 

 The little angel waved her hand, and two tickets for the Queen Mary 2 cruise ship appeared in her hand. Lao Gao thought for a moment and said, 'Hmm, this is very romantic, but such an opportunity is once in a lifetime! I'm so sorry, my dear, my wish is to have a wife thirty years younger than me.' Lao Gao's wife and the little angel were both very disappointed, but a wish is still a wish. Therefore, the little angel waved her hand again, and 'poof!' blew a breath, and Lao Gao became a ninety-two-year-old grandfather!
videoName: 新的道路 新的恩膏 | 曾興才牧師 | 20171008 | 生命河 ROLCCmedia
talk: The God of the Bible is a good God who is very willing to bestow blessings upon those who call upon Him. But why do we often not receive God's blessings? The answer is that we didn't ask Him. You say, 'I did, so why don't I receive blessings?' James tells us, 'You ask and you do not receive, because you ask wrongly.' That means you didn't ask according to God's will, but selfishly asked for your own pleasure and enjoyment. Try to recall what you've asked God for in the past. What things has He accomplished, and what things has He not accomplished or has not yet accomplished? Were there any wrongly asked things? If so, ask God for forgiveness. Then, ask Him again according to His promises.

title: Strength Lies in Peace and Tranquility
scriptureVerse: This is what the Sovereign Lord, the Holy One of Israel, says: 'In repentance and rest is your salvation, in quietness and trust is your strength, but you would have none of it.'
prelude: There are many problems in this world that we cannot solve, and we feel powerless and helpless because of them. We hope in our hearts that a miracle will appear before our eyes.
laugh: One day, Mr. Buffalo was walking alone on the beach when he suddenly kicked something hard. Looking down, he saw it was an oil lamp. He picked it up, wiped the sand off with his sleeve, and a huge genie appeared. Mr. Buffalo asked, 'Can I have three wishes?' The genie replied, 'No, that's an exaggeration used in fairy tales. I can only grant you one wish.' Mr. Buffalo made a request: 'I really want to travel to San Francisco, but I'm afraid of flying. My friend suggested taking a cruise, but I'm afraid of seasickness. Could you build a bridge connecting Taipei and San Francisco?' The genie scolded, 'You're crazy! Do you know how much steel and cement it takes to build such a long bridge? I don't do the impossible. Think of a more practical wish!' Mr. Buffalo said, 'I've been married for seven years, and my wife still says I don't understand her. Can you enlighten me and help me understand what women are thinking when they're not talking? What they actually want when they say 'I don't need'?' The genie sighed and said: 'That bridge across the Pacific Ocean, do you want two lanes or four lanes?'
videoName: 神能成就一切 | 曾興才牧師 | 20180902 | 生命河 ROLCCmedia
talk: When we face difficulties or crises in life, we try our best to find solutions, and we really hope that a benefactor will appear to help us out of danger. The Israelites had a similar experience. When they were surrounded by enemies and in a crisis-ridden environment, relying on their own wisdom and abilities, they still couldn't find a way out. The Lord Jehovah, through the prophet Isaiah, told them a solution: to turn back to God and wholeheartedly trust in the God who had helped them in the past and would help them again. They no longer needed to struggle; knowing that Jehovah was their God, they would regain their strength and enjoy the peace God gave them. Are you currently in a difficult situation or crisis? Stop struggling; turn back to God, pray and rely on Him wholeheartedly, and God will surely open a way for you.

title: Cultivate Inner Beauty
scriptureVerse: Rather, it should be that of your inner self, the unfading beauty of a gentle and quiet spirit, which is of great worth in God's sight.
prelude: The love of beauty is human nature, especially for women. The annual consumption of cosmetics is astonishing, coupled with all sorts of weight loss and cosmetic surgeries, making it impossible to distinguish between the real and the fake.
laugh: A middle-aged woman suffering from heart disease was rushed to the hospital emergency room. Lying on the operating table, she experienced the valley of death and saw God. She asked, 'Is my time coming?' God said, 'No, you have forty-three years, two months, and eight days left.' After recovering, the woman decided to continue her cosmetic surgery in the hospital: facelift, laser treatments, body sculpting, liposuction, and even had her hairstyle and hair color changed. She thought to herself, 'Since I still have so much life left, I should make the most of it.' After the surgery, she left the hospital to go home, but while crossing the street, she was hit and killed by an ambulance. She came before God, indignantly saying, 'Didn't you say I had forty-three more years? Why didn't you save me from the ambulance!' God replied, 'I don't recognize you!'
videoName: 恩慈相待 彼此饒恕 | 曾興才牧師 | 20180729 | 曾興才牧師 | 20210321 | 生命河 ROLCCmedia
talk: Loving beauty is not a bad thing. God, who created heaven and earth, created this beautiful world for us, filled with many beautiful birds and beasts, flowers and trees, etc. He even created men and women in God's own image, the most beautiful and perfect design. However, sometimes, when we overemphasize external makeup and dressing up, and neglect inner gentleness and tranquility, it's not good. In fact, outward adornment is easier than inner cultivation, which is perhaps why everyone pursues it. What God values ​​most is inner cultivation, which requires effort and time to nurture. Sometimes, God shapes our lives through our environment, our family and friends, and even our spouse, so that we may have lasting gentleness, peace, and tranquility within. Such a life and inner beauty will surely be a blessing to many.

title: Blessed Is the Man Who Finds a Wife
scriptureVerse: He who finds a wife finds what is good and receives favor from the Lord.
prelude: The spousal relationship is the most intimate relationship in the world. This relationship can make one feel that there is heaven on earth, or it can make one feel that there is hell on earth. It can be seen that the spousal relationship has a great influence on people!
laugh:
A nutritionist was giving a speech to an audience in Chicago. He said: 

 'What we put into our stomachs is enough to kill every one of us sitting here. Red meat is especially bad, soda erodes your stomach, Chinese food is full of MSG (MSG), not to mention the pesticides in vegetables, and we don't even think about the bacteria in our drinking water, which have been harming our health for a long time. 

 But there is one thing that is most dangerous, and it is something that we all have, or that you will eat. Can anyone tell me what that food is?' 'After you eat it, will it bring you the most sorrow and pain in the years to come?'' After waiting for a long time, no one answered. videoName: 美好婚姻影響世代 | 曾興才牧師 | 20180708 | 生命河 ROLCCmedia
talk: Some people comment on marriage like this: Many people outside of marriage want to enter, but those inside want to leave. What about the wisest person who says, 'He who finds a good wife has gained something good and obtained the favor of the Lord.' You might say, 'That's right! He's talking about those who find a 'good wife,'' so of course they gain something good. But does that mean those who don't find a 'good wife' don't gain anything good?' Actually, that's not the case. The original Bible only mentions gaining a 'wife,' not a 'good wife.' In other words, gaining a wife means gaining something beneficial. To experience the blessing of this passage, we must return to the Creator who instituted marriage. First, marriage is God's good intention in creating it, because He said, 'It is not good for a man to be alone. I will make a helper suitable for him' (Genesis 2:18). Then, we must manage our marriage according to God's will. The Bible is full of teachings on the roles of husband and wife and how to love and submit to each other. If we can carefully follow all of God's words, we will surely enjoy happiness in marriage.

title: The Humble Will Be Exalted
scriptureVerse: For all those who exalt themselves will be humbled, and those who humble themselves will be exalted.
prelude: A proud and arrogant person is unpopular because he is a person without God in his heart and who looks down on others. Conversely, a humble person is welcomed by everyone.
laugh: A newlywed preaching couple was sent to pastor a town. While the wife was packing her luggage, she said to her husband, Pastor Lin: 'Everything I own is yours, you can look at it, except for what's in this little black box. Will you promise me?' Pastor Lin had no choice but to nod in agreement. Twenty years later, Pastor Lin had become Pastor Lin. One day, unable to contain his curiosity any longer, he finally asked what his wife kept in her little black box. Mrs. Lin had no choice but to tell him that there were six eggs and two thousand dollars in it. Pastor Lin asked curiously, 'What does this mean?' His wife replied, 'Every time you preach badly, I put an egg in this little black box.' Pastor Lin was secretly pleased; he'd only given six bad sermons in twenty years. 'And what does the two thousand dollars mean?' he then asked. The wife laughed and replied, 'Oh, whenever I collect a dozen eggs, I take them to the market to sell. That two thousand dollars came from selling eggs!'
videoName: 爸爸非常的愛你 | 曾興才牧師 | 20180617 | 生命河 ROLCCmedia
talk: A proud person is disliked by everyone, and God will find a way to humble him. A humble person will be exalted by God. What are the characteristics of a humble person? First, they are willing to admit their mistakes and take responsibility. Proud people always see the faults of others but not their own shortcomings. Humble people do not judge others arbitrarily, are tolerant of others' weaknesses, and often feel indebted. Second, humble people see others as better than themselves. Human nature often leads us to see others' shortcomings through the lens of our own strengths, thus perceiving others as flawed and in need of improvement, while we ourselves are considered perfect. A humble person, however, intentionally seeks out and appreciates the strengths of others. Even though they may possess many strengths, perhaps even surpassing others, they are willing to use their strengths to compensate for others' weaknesses. This virtue of humility is something everyone desires. Observe the people around you; are they role models? Try to discover their strengths and offer them affirmation and appreciation.

title: Do Not Forsake Wisdom
scriptureVerse: Do not forsake wisdom, and she will protect you; love her, and she will watch over you.
prelude: People are busy seeking knowledge. In this technologically advanced age, knowledge is readily available, and everyone possesses various kinds of knowledge, but truly wise people are few and far between. Some problems can be solved with knowledge alone, but others require wisdom to resolve.
laugh: A large ship's engine broke down. The owner consulted expert after expert, but none could repair the ship. Finally, he found an old man who had been repairing ships since his youth. The old man brought a large bag of tools and carefully examined the engine, from top to bottom… After looking at it extensively, the old man took out a small hammer from his tool bag… He gently tapped the engine, and immediately, it roared to life. A week after the engine was repaired, the boat owner received a bill from the old man for $10,000. 'What?' the boat owner exclaimed, 'He didn't do anything!' He replied to the old man, 'Please write the bill more clearly!' The old man sent another bill with only two items: 1. Tap with a hammer $2.00 2. Know where to tap $9,998.00.
videoName: 同心合意 迎接復興 | 曾興才牧師 | 20180527 | 生命河 ROLCCmedia
talk: Knowledge is important, but wisdom is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is dead, but wisdom can bring knowledge to life. Because only the wise know how to use knowledge most effectively. Therefore, the wisest King Solomon exhorts us not to forsake wisdom. There are two main reasons: First, wisdom can protect you. When you are in a dangerous situation without realizing it, wisdom will promptly remind you and help you escape danger. Or when an evil person wants to attack you, wisdom will tell you how to deal with it or give you a way out, outperforming the evil person who wants to attack you. Second, wisdom can preserve you. This preservation is like a shrewd personal protector, always by your side, who will know in advance the path you should take and the things you should do, so that you can do the right thing at the right time. Where can we obtain wisdom? Proverbs 9:10 says, 'The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom, and knowledge of the Holy One is understanding.'

title: True Love for One Another
scriptureVerse: A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.
prelude: Interpersonal problems are the most troublesome problems, whether it's a relationship between husband and wife, a relationship with colleagues, or a relationship with your mother-in-law, we all hope to resolve it quickly.
laugh:
One day, Farmer Zhang San's mother-in-law came to inspect his work, and she found something she didn't like and had to say a few words. While she was pointing and gesturing by the cowshed and stable, a donkey suddenly kicked her, and she was kicked to death on the spot. 

During the memorial service, the pastor noticed a strange thing: when women spoke to Zhang San, he always nodded, but when men spoke to him, he shook his head. 

 After the meeting, the pastor found the farmer and asked him why. Zhang San replied: Women all say, 'You must be very sad!' So I nodded; men all say, 'Can I borrow your donkey?' I can only shake my head, because the donkey queue is already full until next year, and I can't accept any more applications!
videoName: 屬靈爭戰得勝的秘訣 | 曾興才牧師 | 20180506 | 生命河 ROLCCmedia
talk: Handling complex interpersonal relationships is not as difficult as we imagine. A popular saying in China in recent years is: 'With connections, there are no connections; without connections, there are connections.' What kind of relationship is needed to eliminate connections? The answer is love. This love is not just romantic love between men and women, friendship between friends, or the love of parents for their children.' This love comes from God, a love revealed to us through the Lord Jesus. Therefore, the Lord Jesus said: 'As I have loved you, so you must love one another. Do you know how much Jesus loves you? He sacrificed his life to love you, bearing our sins so that we might have life through Him—eternal life. Therefore, we should also be like Him, willing to pay any price for loving one another. The Lord Jesus' love for us is an unchanging love, a love that lasts forever. Whether we think we are good or bad, worthy or unworthy, Jesus loves us the same way. He never demands that we change before loving us. Therefore, true love doesn't require the other person to do something or change for you before you love them. Because of the Lord Jesus' love, you can completely embrace and accept, sincerely loving and caring for those around you. Try loving those around you with the love of Jesus today!

title: Submit to One Another
scriptureVerse: Submit to one another out of reverence for Christ.
prelude: The relationship between husband and wife is one of love and respect. When these two important factors are removed from marriage, the couple will be in a state of fear and insecurity.
laugh: One day, Lao Zeng and his wife were celebrating their golden wedding anniversary. A middle-aged neighbor, who was watching the commotion, asked Lao Zeng: 'Why have you maintained a happy and fulfilling marriage for fifty years? Since I was born, I have never heard you two argue... Have you never had a disagreement?' Lao Zeng said: 'There have been disagreements, but they never escalated. I learned this lesson from our honeymoon. I remember when transportation was inconvenient, we went to the Grand Canyon for our honeymoon, and each of us hired a donkey...' Her donkey was clearly lazy and refused to move after walking for a short while. My wife coldly said to it, 'The first time.' When the donkey slacked off a second time, she pointed at it again and said, 'This is the second time.' When the donkey refused to move a third time, she calmly took out her rental pistol and killed it. The middle-aged neighbor said in astonishment, 'Your wife is so cruel!' Lao Zeng said, 'Isn't that right? I couldn't stand it either, so I stopped by the roadside to criticize her. But she didn't argue with me; she just coldly said, 'This is the first time!' From then on, I understood!
videoName: 得神和人的恩寵 | 曾興才牧師 | 20180318 | 生命河 ROLCCmedia
talk: After God established the institution of marriage, He declared: 'Therefore a man shall leave his father and mother and be united to his wife, and they shall become one flesh.' (Genesis 2:24) The spousal relationship becomes the most intimate relationship in the world, and also the most challenging. Therefore, when the Apostle Paul explained how husbands and wives should get along, he first clarified a major principle: 'Submit to one another in reverence.' This refers to reverence for Christ Jesus. In other words, both husband and wife must have reverence for Christ, a heart that magnifies the Lord Jesus, in order to have a heart of mutual submission. A husband who reveres the Lord Jesus will obey His commands and love his wife as Christ loved the church and gave himself for it. A wife who reveres the Lord Jesus will submit to her husband as she submits to the Lord. When husband and wife each manage their marriage according to the Lord Christ's commands, the Lord's blessings will overflow upon them and flow from them into their home!

title: The Benefits of Sharing the Gospel with You
scriptureVerse: I do all this for the sake of the gospel, that I may share in its blessings.
prelude: Identifying with others is one way to build good interpersonal relationships. Some people try every means to identify with others in order to please them; others genuinely want to identify with others in order to gain their acceptance.
laugh: There was an indigenous tribe where everyone had to be naked during their gatherings. Despite facing much disdain and insults, they never changed their tribal rules. Once, a plague broke out in their tribe, and many fell ill. The tribe's doctors were helpless, so they decided to invite a renowned doctor from a neighboring tribe. The doctor, aware of their strange custom, felt embarrassed to go, but unable to refuse their repeated invitations and believing that saving lives was more important than saving face, he agreed. Finally, the day arrived to welcome the doctor. The tribe thought, 'We've finally managed to invite the doctor; out of respect, let's make an exception.' So, everyone dressed, wore ties, and gathered in their meeting hall. After the bell rang, the doctor entered, and everyone was stunned. The elderly, white-haired doctor carried a heavy medical bag, but was completely naked!
videoName: 同心領受命定的福 | 曾興才牧師 | 20180922 | 生命河 ROLCCmedia
talk: The Apostle Paul was one of the greatest disciples of the Lord Jesus. He endured persecution, calamity, and suffering to spread the gospel—the good news—and was willing to humble himself and connect with those he encountered. Therefore, he said, 'To the weak I have become weak, so that I may win the weak. To all people I have become all of myself, so that by any means I may save some. All that I do is for the sake of the gospel, that I may share in its benefits.' (1 Corinthians 9:22-23) Why was Paul so determined to share the benefits of the gospel with others? Because the gospel is so important to you! What is the gospel? The gospel is God's deep love for you and the people of the world, so much so that He sent His only begotten Son, Jesus Christ, to come into the world, to die on the cross for your and my sins, and to rise from the dead on the third day, giving you and me eternal life. As long as you are willing to believe and accept Jesus Christ as the Lord of your life, you can enjoy abundant life, eternal life.' Each of us must make the decision to believe in and accept the Lord Jesus. If you are willing, you can pray the following prayer to tell the Lord Jesus your decision: 'Dear Heavenly Father, I thank You for loving me so much, for giving me Your only begotten Son, the Lord Jesus, who died on the cross for my sins and rose from the dead on the third day. I now want to believe in and accept the Lord Jesus as my personal Savior, to forgive my sins, and to give me abundant, eternal life. I want to follow You and worship You all my life. I pray this in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ, Amen!' Congratulations! According to the promise of God the Father, you have now become His child: 'To all who did receive him (the Lord Jesus), who believed in his (the Lord Jesus') name, he gave the right to become children of God' (John 1:12).
